item.title: FT Most Read: Saturday, May 18, 2024 at 2:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Russian court seizes assets worth €700mn from UniCredit, Deutsche Bank and Commerzbank
2. Crozier’s claim he was unaware of Post Office scandal undermined by letters
3. [Opinion] What can and can’t be learnt from Singapore
4. Russia has advanced 10km towards Kharkiv, says Ukraine
5. Thames Water’s biggest shareholder writes off investment
item.guid: FT Most Read: Saturday, May 18, 2024 at 2:15 PM UTC
